channel.title: Recent Executive Orders
channel.description: Latest Executive Orders from the White House

item.title: Further Extending the TikTok Enforcement Delay
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Extension.
